backend/main.mo: Defines core marketplace types and state for items, lost & found, user profiles, onboarding, and chat, including helper functions and admin email whitelist.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding nextMessageId and initializing chatState.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for chat UI, contact actions, contact page update, and visual theme work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing routing, components, styles, and chat-related hooks.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point defining metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, including new messages inbox and thread pages, wrapped in layout with profile setup.
frontend/src/components/AddItemModal.tsx: Modal for creating items with fields, image upload handling, and categorized error reporting on submit.
frontend/src/components/AuthResolutionEr: Displays error screens for timeout, access-denied, or generic errors with icons, messages, and retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmati: A confirmation dialog for deleting an item with cancel and delete actions, showing loading state when deleting.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAddButto: A fixed circular button that triggers an add action when clicked.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, description, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, search, authentication handling, mobile menu, and messaging access.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Displays an item preview with image, details, badges, price, and optional contact/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Modal prompting users to log in or sign up with Internet Identity, showing loading states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAvatarMen: User avatar dropdown showing profile info and providing a logout option.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Controls onboarding flow by checking profile and onboarding answers, displaying dialogs, and submitting profile data and questions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitGuard.ts: Initializes the authenticated actor with timeout and error handling, exposing status and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines profile, onboarding, and other actor-backed queries and mutations with timeout and error sanitization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom OKLCH color system with light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, features, and overview of the UniXange platform.
frontend/src/pages/BuySection.tsx: Displays marketplace buy listings with filtering, item deletion, and seller contact actions, including login and network error handling.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Provides contact and support options with links to messaging and support emails, prompting login when necessary.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, category shortcuts, and previews of recent buy and rental items.
frontend/src/pages/LostFoundSection.tsx: Manages lost and found listings with item creation, deletion, profile checks, and messaging the item owner.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesInbox.tsx: Shows the user's message inbox with navigation back home and a placeholder when no conversations exist.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThread.tsx: Displays a conversation thread with message sending, auto-scrolling, and error handling for invalid or failed loads.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page with sections describing data collection, usage, sharing, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/RentSection.tsx: Manages rental listings with item fetch, add, delete, and contact-owner actions, handling authentication and profile validation.
frontend/src/pages/SellSection.tsx: Displays and manages the user's items for sale, including adding and deleting listings with auth and profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Renders the Terms of Service page outlining eligibility, responsibilities, prohibited activities, and liability limits.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitErrors.ts: Defines timeout error helpers and type guards for actor initialization handling.
frontend/src/utils/adminEmailAllowlist.t: Stores an admin email allowlist and provides helpers to check or retrieve allowed emails.
frontend/src/utils/authIntent.ts: Provides utilities to persist and retrieve login/signup intent via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/icRejectionErrors.ts: Detects IC rejection errors, including stopped canister cases, and extracts canister IDs.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Wraps promises with a timeout, producing a standardized timeout error on delay.
Converts raw errors into user-friendly messages, handling IC, timeout, network, and auth issues.
frontend/src/utils/universityEmail.ts: Validates Jain University emails or allowlisted admin emails and provides an error message helper.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and layout settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state and feature roadmap focused on building an in-app chat system with polling.
